model.characters

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.characters.Character
      • model.characters.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Fighter

    public class Player
extends Character
implements Fighter
    Player is the class to describe the properties and behaviors of a Player in the Dungeon
    Author:
    Aylin G., Amelie M., Sofian C., Laurent T.
